This is the implementation class for all hardware devices.

alarmFired() - Method in interface org.remoteHome.LightAlarmDeviceListener
This method is called by the API, when alarm is received.
alarmOff() - Method in class org.remoteHome.LightAlarmDevice
This method will switch Off the alarm sensor.
alarmOn() - Method in class org.remoteHome.LightAlarmDevice
This method will switch ON the alarm sensor.
AlarmStatus - Class in org.remoteHome
Defines the status codes of the alarm sensor 0 disabled, 1 enabled, 2 activated, 3 leave timeout running, 4 enter timeout running
